context: FICO is the leading provider of credit scoring and decision management solutions. The FICO Score is used in over 90% of US lending decisions. The company also provides fraud detection and analytics software.

competitors.name: Equifax
competitors.notes: Credit bureau with competing analytics and decisioning solutions

competitors.name: Experian
competitors.notes: Credit bureau offering alternative credit scores and decisioning tools

competitors.name: TransUnion
competitors.notes: Credit bureau with risk management and fraud prevention solutions

competitors.name: VantageScore
competitors.notes: Alternative credit scoring model created by the three bureaus

competitors.name: LexisNexis Risk Solutions
competitors.notes: Analytics and decisioning for financial services and insurance

competitors.name: SAS
competitors.notes: Analytics software competing in fraud detection and risk management

competitors.name: Featurespace
competitors.notes: AI-powered fraud prevention competing with FICO Falcon

competitors.name: Provenir
competitors.notes: AI-powered risk decisioning platform for financial services
